main event: A sighting was reported of a disc-like object falling from the sky and on fire on 25 February 1958.
interesting points: The event was reported shortly after midnight by Multiple witnesses including civilians,They described a long red streak in the sky traveling east toward Gander AFB., The area where the object allegedly touched down showed signs of a clearing in the snow but no heat or tracks were found., A snowplow was active in the area, which may have accounted for some of the observed lights., Flight Officer Miller from Gander reported seeing an object on radar that disappeared and suggested it was a bright star.
witness description: civilians including Mr. [REDACTED], Mrs. [REDACTED], and her daughter
